item.title: TIFU at Work: Learn and Move On!
item.description: Everyone makes mistakes. If someone says otherwise, they’re probably not being straight with you. It’s bound to happen whether you’re new to a job or have been there for a while. You can find plenty of horror stories on Reddit and HackerNews. Take, for example, this post with a collection of those stories: Ask HN: What’s the worst you’ve ever screwed up at work? | Hacker News I felt that gut-wrenching moment when you realize a mistake has been made.
